articles.title: Netflix's Beef: Best Fan Reactions - BuzzFeed
articles.description: Netflix's Beef starring Steven Yeun and Ali Wong is the newest series that everyone can't stop talking about, and it's genuinely one of the best new shows of 2023.

articles.author: Samantha Bergeson
articles.title: Toni Collette on the Fated ‘Mafia Mamma’ Franchise and the ‘Slight Panic’ of Her Directing Debut - IndieWire
articles.description: “The experience of making it was the most joyous of my career,” the actress told IndieWire of leading “Mafia Mamma,” which she hopes will spawn a series.
articles.content:
No one is having as much fun as Toni Collette.
The Golden Globe, SAG Award, and Emmy winner leads mob boss comedy “Mafia Mamma” from director Catherine Hardwicke, marking a reunion since their 2015 … [+5729 chars]

articles.title: Remembering Satish Kaushik: Satish Shah remembers the jovial man who hid his tragic life story with booming laughter - The Indian Express
articles.description: Satish Kaushik's Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro co-star Satish Shah reveals how the former was deeply disturbed after his son passed away, but still kept the world laughing. Kaushik passed away in March this year.
articles.content: The audience would remember Satish Kaushik for the iconic comic roles he played in his long and storied career. Satish, who would have been 67 today, passed away in March this year, leaving his legio… [+5090 chars]
